tools.name: DeepChat
tools.description: A fully free desktop smart assistant, with a powerful DeepSeek large model, supporting multi-round conversations, internet search, file uploads, knowledge bases, and more.

tools.name: Quantalogic
tools.description: A ReAct framework for building advanced AI agents. It aims to accelerate the development of powerful, safe, and accessible AI agents.

tools.name: Chatbox
tools.description: A desktop client for multiple cutting-edge LLM models. Cross-platform, supports search providers, custom models, Azure OpenAI, and more.

tools.name: NextChat
tools.description: A cross-platform ChatGPT web UI with PWA support, optimized for conversation, Prompt Library, and plugins. Based on Vercel.

tools.name: Coco AI
tools.description: An open source unified search and productivity tool that searches, summarizes and organizes your digital information.

tools.name: Liubai
tools.description: A note/todo management system within WeChat, where simple tags help with classification, and AI helps with analysis, content creation, summarization and more.

tools.name: Pal
tools.description: A customized chat playground for iOS, integrating multiple LLM models like GPT, DeepSeek, Claude, etc.

tools.name: LibreChat
tools.description: A customizable open-source app for interacting with multiple AI models, including ChatGPT, DeepSeek AI, Claude 3, and more.

tools.name: Lobe Chat
tools.description: An open-source, modern-design AI chat framework supporting multiple AI providers (OpenAI, Claude 3, Gemini, Ollama, Qwen, DeepSeek), knowledge base, multi-modals, and one-click free deployment.

tools.name: PapersGPT
tools.description: A Zotero plugin for improved papers reading and research with ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, DeepSeek, Phi 4, Llama 3.2, Gemma and Mistral.

tools.name: DeepSeek Coder
tools.description: A suite of AI coding models and tools, supporting various programming languages, with outstanding performance in code generation, infilling, and error fixing.
